source_caption_data.pre_caption: This is a breathtaking aerial shot of a city at sunrise, blanketed in a thick layer of fog. The sun peeks over distant hills, casting a warm, golden glow on the sea of clouds. On the right, a historic-looking church or monastery sits on a hilltop, emerging majestically from the mist. The camera performs a slow, steady aerial movement, offering a serene and expansive view of the stunning landscape.
source_caption_data.pre_caption_prompt: The video is a scenery shot. You do not need to describe the subject motion. Just note that briefly in one to three sentences.
source_caption_data.final_caption: This is a breathtaking aerial shot of a city at sunrise, blanketed in a thick layer of fog. The sun peeks over distant hills, casting a warm, golden glow on the sea of clouds. On the right, a historic-looking church or monastery sits on a hilltop, emerging majestically from the mist. The camera performs a slow, steady aerial movement, offering a serene and expansive view of the stunning landscape.

bad_caption: A group of cyclists rides along a winding coastal road as waves crash against the rocky shoreline below. The camera follows their movement from above, gradually zooming in as the cyclists navigate sharp turns and ascend a steep incline. In the distance, a lighthouse comes into view, and the cyclists pause briefly at the overlook before continuing their journey along the cliffside path.
